Key Match Events: Kieffer Moore's opening goal, Harry Wilson's second goal, Driton Camaj's goal for Montenegro
Pre-Game Insights: Wales' first game under Craig Bellamy as manager
Post-Match Reflections: Wales' first win in four games
Miscellaneous Highlights: Wales' 800-plus following headed to Niksic, Karl Darlow becoming Wales' oldest debutant since World War II
Others: Montenegro's aggressive approach, incessant rain affecting the game, Niksic hosting its first men's senior international
